Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.esn.ui

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcmsplugin.esn.ui.Link
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ESNHTMLConstants
    public class Link
extends java.lang.Object
implements ESNHTMLConstants
    Initially intended for Accessibility purposes to render A HTML elements for non navigation action.
    Adds relevant HTML ARIA attributes, data-* attributes, and standard attributes.
    Example: ajax-refresh; custom JS
    Also support A[href] navigation links.

    Link will be given the BUTTON role by default (only if no href is set), a tabindex to be focusable.
    Ajax-refresh link may be given noscroll and nohistory or custom options.
    Ajax-refresh link will be given ajax-refresh data-jalios-action, and provided ajax HTTP parameters

    Since:
    esn-6.7.2
    Author:
    Sylvain Devaux

      • addRelNoReferrer

        public Link addRelNoReferrer()
        Sets rel attribute to ESNHTMLConstants.REL_NOREFERRER.

        To be used on _blank target links to external site for performances and security issues.

        Returns:
        chain
        Since:
        esn-6.7.2
